Room.Name: Cavern Cliff
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the corner of one of the caverns deep within the planet.
Room.LongDescription: To the south you can see a cliff, but beyond that there is nothing but blackness. It's the great abyss. It's going to be impossible to cross it without some serious help. Far overhead is a great ice cap which is slightly luminous, but apparently very thick and several thousand meters away. You have descended to a much deeper level than when you came in.
